flags.name: Show Dashboard Page
flags.description: Controls access to the main dashboard page (/)

flags.name: Show Jobs Page
flags.description: Controls access to the jobs table page (/jobs)

flags.name: Show Job Detail Page
flags.description: Controls access to individual job detail pages (/jobs/[jobId])

flags.name: Show Analytics Page
flags.description: Controls access to the analytics dashboard (/analytics)

flags.name: Show Prep Page
flags.description: Controls access to the master prep page (/prep)

flags.name: Show Company Prep Page
flags.description: Controls access to the company prep list page (/prep/companies)

flags.name: Show Company Detail Page
flags.description: Controls access to individual company prep pages (/prep/companies/[companyId])

flags.name: Show STAR Stories Page
flags.description: Controls access to the STAR stories page (/star-stories)

flags.name: Show Landing Page
flags.description: Controls access to the main landing page (/landing)

flags.name: Show Landing Job Tracker
flags.description: Controls access to the job tracker marketing page (/landing/job-tracker)

flags.name: Show Landing Prep Hub
flags.description: Controls access to the prep hub marketing page (/landing/prep-hub)

flags.name: Show Landing Analytics
flags.description: Controls access to the analytics marketing page (/landing/analytics)

flags.name: Show Dashboard Hero
flags.description: Controls visibility of the hero section on the dashboard

flags.name: Show Dashboard Metrics
flags.description: Controls visibility of the metric cards section on the dashboard

flags.name: Show Dashboard Recent Jobs
flags.description: Controls visibility of the recent applications section on the dashboard

flags.name: Show Dashboard Upcoming Actions
flags.description: Controls visibility of the upcoming actions section on the dashboard

flags.name: Show Dashboard Quick Links
flags.description: Controls visibility of the quick links section on the dashboard

flags.name: Show Dashboard Follow-ups Alert
flags.description: Controls visibility of the follow-ups due alert on the dashboard

flags.name: Enable CSV Import
flags.description: Enables the CSV import functionality for jobs

flags.name: Enable Timeline View
flags.description: Enables the timeline view option in the jobs table

flags.name: Enable Inline Editing
flags.description: Enables inline editing functionality on the job detail page

flags.name: Enable Export Functionality
flags.description: Enables export to CSV/PDF functionality

flags.name: Enable Advanced Filters
flags.description: Enables advanced filtering options in the jobs table

flags.name: Enable Bulk Actions
flags.description: Enables bulk job actions functionality

flags.name: Show Job Timeline Section
flags.description: Controls visibility of the timeline section on job detail pages

flags.name: Show Job Prep Checklist
flags.description: Controls visibility of the prep checklist sidebar on job detail pages

flags.name: Show Job STAR Stories
flags.description: Controls visibility of the STAR stories panel on job detail pages

flags.name: Show Job Metrics Cards
flags.description: Controls visibility of the metric cards at the top of job detail pages

flags.name: Show Admin Page
flags.description: Controls access to the admin/feature flag dashboard. When enabled, shows a red admin button in the sidebar.
